DOMMatrixReadOnly.summary: The DOMMatrixReadOnly interface represents a read-only 4×4 matrix, suitable for 2D and 3D operations. The interface — which is based upon DOMMatrixReadOnly—adds mutability, allowing you to alter the matrix after creating it.

remarks.para: This interface should be available inside web workers, though some implementations doesn't allow it yet.

-The mutable matrix type, , which is based on this one.
-The CSS transform-function/matrix and transform-function/matrix3d functional notation that can be generated from this interface to be used in a CSS transform.
